name: sbt
description: The simple build tool (sbt) and is a widely used interactive build tool for scala projects.

Commands.val: Starts the scala interpreter (including classpath, dependencies and sources)
Deletes all generated files from the ./target folder
Compiles the sources in scr/main/(scala|java) directories
Run the main class for the project
Display detailed help for the specified command. If no command is provided, displays brief descriptions of all commands
Resolves dependencies according to the settings in the build file
Creates a jar file containing the files in src/main/resources and the classes compiled from src/main/scala and src/main/java.
